title: GymX - Multi-Tenant Gym Management System
overview: A multi-tenant SaaS for gyms to manage memberships, classes, and trainers, each with a customizable dashboard and branding.
problemStatement: Most gym management systems are monolithic and expensive for small or medium-sized gyms. GymX offers isolated environments with custom features per gym at scale.

features.title: Tenant-Aware Gym Dashboards
features.description: Each gym has its own login, dashboard, and branded frontend.

features.title: Membership and Class Scheduling
features.description: Manage members, trainers, and class bookings easily.

features.title: Role-Based Access
features.description: Different access for admins, trainers, and members.

title: CineTracker - Movie/TV Watchlist & Reminder App
overview: An app that lets users track movies and shows they want to watch, set reminders for releases, and get availability updates across platforms.
problemStatement: Movie fans often forget release dates or where to stream titles. CineTracker centralizes tracking and notifies users across devices.

features.title: Cross-Platform Tracker
features.description: Track movie/show status and release dates.

features.title: Notifications and Alerts
features.description: Reminders sent before new episodes or movie drops.

features.title: Streaming Availability
features.description: Know where to watch across Netflix, Prime, etc.

title: Tikky - Real-time Tic-Tac-Toe Game
overview: A multiplayer web-based Tic-Tac-Toe game that allows players to challenge each other in real-time using WebSockets.
problemStatement: Turn-based games often require real-time interactivity for a smooth player experience. Traditional implementations using polling are inefficient and not scalable.

features.title: Real-time Gameplay
features.description: Instant updates for both players using WebSockets.

features.title: Player Matching
features.description: Auto-match players or invite friends via unique game links.

features.title: Game State Persistence
features.description: Games can be resumed if connection drops.

title: fzbot - CLI Movie Downloader
overview: A fast and async CLI bot to search and download movies and TV shows from the internet using asyncio and aiohttp.
problemStatement: Many download bots are slow, sequential, or require manual searching. This bot simplifies the process with an automated CLI.

features.title: Fast Downloads
features.description: Downloads chunks of files in parallel.

features.title: Progress Visualization
features.description: CLI shows download progress with tqdm.

title: CineTracker - Movie/TV Watchlist & Reminder App
overview: An app that lets users track movies and shows they want to watch, set reminders for releases, and get availability updates across platforms.
problemStatement: Movie fans often forget release dates or where to stream titles. CineTracker centralizes tracking and notifies users across devices.

features.title: Cross-Platform Tracker
features.description: Track movie/show status and release dates.

features.title: Notifications and Alerts
features.description: Reminders sent before new episodes or movie drops.

features.title: Streaming Availability
features.description: Know where to watch across Netflix, Prime, etc.

title: Multi-tenant SaaS School Management System
overview: A customizable school management SaaS allowing each school to register, customize landing pages, manage users, and handle payments.
problemStatement: Most school systems are not customizable or multi-tenant. Schools need branded control and isolated environments.

features.title: Tenant Isolation
features.description: Each school has its own schema and database isolation.

features.title: Custom Landing Page
features.description: Schools can customize their frontend from the admin dashboard.

features.title: Subscription Plans
features.description: Built-in support for free and paid plans via Stripe.
